</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns array with all items assigned to the [[primaryWeapon]] except magazines. Use [[primaryWeaponMagazine]] command for the latter. This command is used for infantry weapons only.  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''primaryWeaponItems''' unit </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] -  [silencer, laserpointer/flashlight, optics, bipod] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[primaryWeaponItems]] [[player]]; 
/*
[
	"muzzle_snds_H",	//silencer
	"acc_pointer_IR",	//laser
	"optic_Aco",		//optics
	"bipod_01_F_blk"	//bipod
]
<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>*/</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>
</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
